actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to authorize expenditures by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for repairs of certain dwellings.

summary.text: Revises the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make expenditures to correct defects in any single or multi-family dwelling covered by a Federal Housing Administration insured mortgage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to authorize expenditures by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for repairs of certain dwellings.
